short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create notes at the touch of a button! Click on the icon, click 'Add A Note', and write whatever you want!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows users to create notes on almost any webpage on the chrome browser.

Create one by either holding down shift + clicking the screen or clicking the notes icon in the top right corner of the browser! Edit the note by either pinning it to that part of the webpage or let it hover as you scroll. Change the color, size and text with a click of a button around any of the notes.

Check and edit all of your information by clicking Go To Dashboard and see all the notes for any browser they exist in. In the dashboard, use the search bar to filter the notes that you are looking for. Customize your dashboard's title by clicking the edit button and typing in your own name for your notes.
